attributes.action: Stop giving mobile phone companys permission to install 5G Masts near homes.
attributes.additional_details:
These 5G masts are not only a massive eyesore at (70 feet tall) they encourage vandalism,(the last one installed was set alight on the 14.04.2020 just day's after it was put up.)
 They are a health hazzard to local residents, they also devalue our properties.
They seem to be putting them up everywhere along our Avenue because we have a strip of grass in the centre of the road, which clearly the council are giving them planning permission without notifiying the residents that live there.
attributes.background:
Stop giving mobile phone comapnys permission to be able to put a 5G Mast in public places, without consulting residents first, and giving them an option to oppose it before planning permission is given the go ahead.
As they are installing a 5G Mast outside our house in RM8.

rejection.details:
Decisions about planning permission for mobile phone masts are a matter for your local authority, not the Government or House of Commons.

If you are concerned about a mast being erected near your home you should contact your local authority about this.

You can find out how to petition Barking and Dagenham Borough Council directly here: https://www.lbbd.gov.uk/petitions
